overview: The future is here! We Are NXT! Witness the next generation of WWE first-hand and relive the greatest NXT matches of 2017 with this definitive set, including all the heart-stopping action! Witness Drew McIntyre take on the massive Killian Dane, the incredible United Kingdom Championship Match between Tyler Bate and Pete Dunne, the brutal Last Woman Standing Match featuring Asuka and Nikki Cross, plus more!
title: NXT: Best of 2017
